entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
